results.name: Unknown Number: A First Person Talker

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 11 (Big Sur) or later (Intel or Apple Silicon)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support -OR- Any Apple Silicon CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel, AMD or Apple Silicon GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: IMPORTANT: This game REQUIRES a wired or internal (laptop) microphone to play. Microphones in Bluetooth headphones/headsets are NOT supported.
